SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner
Annotation Type ServerConfiguration

@Documented
@Inherited
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
@SeleniumConfiguration
public @interface ServerConfiguration

ServerConfiguration defines class-level meta-data which can be used to instruct client code with regard to use a Selenium server.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Brian Matthews

Required Element Summary
 String browserURL
          The browser URL.
 
Optional Element Summary
 String[] browserStartCommands
          The browser start commands used to launch the tests.
 String serverHost
          The host on which the Selenium Server resides.
 int serverPort
          The port on which the Selenium Server is listening.
 

Element Detail

browserURL

public abstract String browserURL
The browser URL.

serverHost

public abstract String serverHost
The host on which the Selenium Server resides. The default value is Constants.SELENIUM_SERVER_HOST.

Default:
"localhost"

serverPort

public abstract int serverPort
The port on which the Selenium Server is listening. The default value is Constants.SELENIUM_SERVER_PORT.

Default:
4444

browserStartCommands

public abstract String[] browserStartCommands
The browser start commands used to launch the tests. The default value is Constants.DEFAULT_START_COMMAND.

Default:
"*firefox"
